column2: "Nna Siriahen no dɔm do ɔsafohen Naaman yɛ nyimpa kɛse wɔ no wura enyim
column3: na ɔyɛ onyimnyamfo so
column4: osiandɛ ɔno na EWURADZE nam no do dzii konyim maa Siria. Afei so ɔyɛ nyimpa katakyi a ɔyɛ ndam

column2: "Nna Siriafo no hɔn akodzi no mu kor no
column3: wɔakɛfa abaawa kakraba bi ndɔmmum wɔ Israel asaase do aba; na ɔsom Naaman ne yer no."

column2: "Na ɔsee no wuraba dɛ
column3: Kɛtseankyɛ mo wura wɔ nkɔnhyɛnyi a ɔwɔ Samaria no nkyɛn! Ɔno nkyɛ ɔbɛsa no kwata ama no."

column2: "Na Naaman kɔree kɛkaa kyerɛɛ no wura
column3: dɛ
column4: Dɛm na dɛm na abaawa a ofi Israel asaase do no se."

column2: "Na Siriahen no see dɛ
column3: Kɔ bra
column4: na mobɔsoma ma wɔdze nwoma akɛma Israelhen no. Ntsi osii mu kɔree

column2: "Na ɔdze nwoma no brɛɛ Israelhen dɛ
column3: Sɛ nwoma yi du wo nsamu a
column4: hwɛ
column5: Masoma m’akowaa Naaman wɔ wo hɔ ma aasa no kwata no ama no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Israelhen no kenkaan nwoma no no
column4: ɔtsetseew ne ntar mu
column8: na nyimpa yi rosoma ma ɔaaba mo hɔ dɛ mensa nyimpa no kwata yi? Meserɛ hom
column10: mbrɛ oesi rohwehwɛ manso etsia me."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Nyame nyimpa Elisha tsee dɛ Israelhen atsetsew ne ntar mu no
column4: ɔsomae ma wɔkɔr ɔhen no nkyɛn
column6: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na atsetsew wo ntar mu yi? Ma ɔmbra me nkyɛn ɛ
column7: na obohu dɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi wɔ Israel."

column2: "Nna Naaman nye no mpɔnkɔ nye ne ntseaseanam bae
column3: na obegyinaa Elisha ne fi abowano."

column2: "Na Elisha somaa abɔfo ma wɔkɔr ne nkyɛn
column3: dɛ
column4: Kɔ na koguar Jordan mu mpɛn esuon
column5: na wo honam bɛsan aba wo ho

column2: "Na Naaman no bo fuwii
column3: na osii mu kɔree
column4: na ɔsee dɛ
column8: na oebegyina hɔ abɔ n’EWURADZE Nyankopɔn no ne dzin

column2: "Ana Damaskɔs esutsen
column3: Abana na Farpar
column4: nnye nnsen Israel nsu nyinara? Aso nkyɛ munnguar mu ma mo ho mfir? Nna ɔdaan noho na ɔdze ebufuw sii mu kɔree."

column2: "Na no nkowaa no twee pinii bɛkasaa kyerɛɛ no
column3: see dɛ
column4: M’egya
column5: ana sɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi no kaa kyerɛɛ wo dɛ yɛ adze kɛse bi a
column6: aso nkyɛ annyɛ bi a? Na nkyii

column2: "Nna osianee kɔree na ɔdze noho kɔbɔɔ Jordan mu mpɛn esuon
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Nyame nyimpa no n’asɛm no tse: na no honam sanee baa dɛ abofra kakraba no honam
column4: na no ho firii."

column2: "Na ɔsanee baa Nyame nyimpa no nkyɛn
column3: ɔno na no kuw nyinara
column4: na ɔbae begyinaa n’enyim: na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Hwɛ afei mehu dɛ Nyame bi nnyi asaase nyinara do
column6: dɛ Israel nko: dɛm ntsi afei

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Dɛ EWURADZE a migyina n’enyim tse ase yi
column4: merenngye bi. Na ɔhyɛɛ no dɛ ɔngye; na ɔpowee."

column2: "Na Naaman see dɛ
column3: Sɛ erenngye m’akyɛdze a
column4: ɔno meserɛ wo
column5: ma wɔmfa dɛtse asoasompɔnkɔ beenu ndzesoa mma w’akowaa; osiandɛ ofi ndɛ kɔ yi w’akowaa rommbɔ ɔhyew afɔr anaa okum afɔr mma enyame biara

column2: "Adze kortsee na EWURADZE mfa nkyɛ w’akowaa; sɛ mo wura rokɔ Rimmon fie akɔsɔr wɔ hɔ
column3: na ɔtwer me nsa do
column4: na mobɔ mo mu adze wɔ Rimmon fie a
column5: sɛ mobɔ mo mu adze wɔ Rimmon fie a
column6: EWURADZE mfa nkyɛ w’akowaa wɔ asɛm yi mu."

column2: "Na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Kɔ asomdwee mu. Nna osii mu fii ne nkyɛn kɔr kan kakra."

column2: "Na Nyame nyimpa Elisha n’akowaa Gehazi
column3: see dɛ
column4: Hwɛ
column5: mo wura egyaa Sirianyi Naaman yi
column6: dɛ ɔaangye ne nsamu dza ɔdze bae no: dɛ EWURADZE tse ase yi

column2: "Nna Gehazi tsiiw Naaman. Na aber a Naaman hun dɛ obi dze mbirika refa no no
column3: ofii tseaseanam no mu dwirii behyiaa no
column4: na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Asomdwee mu a. Mo wura asoma me dɛ
column4: Hwɛ
column5: seseiara nkɔnhyɛfo mba no mu mberantsɛ beenu fi Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu aba me nkyɛn; meserɛ wo

column2: "Na Naaman see dɛ
column3: Pen na gye talent ebien. Na ɔhyɛɛ no
column4: na ɔkyekyeer dwetɛ  talent   ebien wɔ nkotoku ebien mu
column5: nye ntar hyɛpɛn ebien ka ho
column6: na ɔdze soaa no nkowaa no mu beenu; na wɔsoso dzi n’enyim."

column2: "Na aber a odur koko no ho no
column3: ɔgyee wɔ hɔn nsamu
column4: na ɔdze maa esie wɔ fie: na ogyaa mbarimba no kwan

column2: "Na ɔnodze ɔsanee kɔr no wura nkyɛn. Na Elisha see no dɛ
column3: Gehazi
column4: ifi hen nam? Na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Ana aber a ɔbarimba no fi ne tseaseanam mu sanee dɛ oribehyia wo no
column4: mo sunsum nye wo annkɔ bi a? Ana aber a wɔgye sika
column6: na  olive   nture na wenyin nture
column8: na nkowaa na mfonabaa nye yi a?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Naaman no kwata no bɛtakyer ɔwo
column3: na w’asefo daa. Na ofii n’enyim kɔree a kwata eguar no fitaa dɛ esukwankyɛba."
